Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Cefalu (Cefalu Coast), Hotel Alberi del Paradiso is convenient to Cefalu Beach and Salita Saraceno Staircase. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Osteria Magno and Lavatoio Medievale.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 55 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 1 km.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Cefalu (Cefalu Coast), Hotel Alberi del Paradiso is convenient to Cefalu Beach and Salita Saraceno Staircase. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Osteria Magno and Lavatoio Medievale.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cefalu Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Salita Saraceno Staircase - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Osteria Magno - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Lavatoio Medievale - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Church of Purgatory - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Museo Mandralisca - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Temple of Diana - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Palazzo Atenasio Martino - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Palazzo Piraino - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Cefalu Cathedral - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Rocca of Cefalu - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Santa Maria dell'Odigitria - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Caldura Beach - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Sanctuary of Gibilmanna - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Kartodromo Lascari - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Alberi del Paradiso is Palermo (PMO-Punta Raisi) - 81.5 km / 50.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
